data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Crotone's Junior Messias is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, Genoa's Mattia Destro has run offside.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Genoa, Davide Zappacosta of Genoa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 4, Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
Genoa take a 1-0 lead thanks to Mattia Destro.
In the minute 6, That's a fine assist from Paolo Ghiglione.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 9, Goal! Goran Pandev extends Genoa's lead to 2-0.
Edoardo Goldaniga with an assist there.
Giovanni Ayroldi blows against Genoa's Goran Pandev for offside.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Simeon Nwankwo of Crotone smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Genoa push upfield but Giovanni Ayroldi quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 17, Davide Zappacosta of Genoa is pulled up for offside.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
Crotone to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Genoa have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Genoa's Paolo Ghiglione is whistled for offside at Luigi Ferraris.
In Genoa Crotone attack through Emmanuel Riviere. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 23, Giovanni Ayroldi awards Genoa a goal kick.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Davide Zappacosta for Genoa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Mattia Destro (Genoa) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Crotone.
Goal! Emmanuel Riviere pulls one back for Crotone to make it 2-1.
Great play from Salvatore Molina to set up the goal.
In the minute 29, In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Salvatore Molina (Crotone) has received a first yellow card.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Genoa.
In the minute 31, Crotone's Antonio Mazzotta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 32, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Genoa.
Antonio Mazzotta (Crotone) has received a yellow card from Giovanni Ayroldi.
In the minute 33, Genoa have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Davide Zappacosta puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-1.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Crotone have a goal kick.
Free kick for Crotone in the half of Genoa.
Davide Zappacosta is booked for the home team.
In the minute 39, Davide Biraschi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in Genoa.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Davide Biraschi is back on his feet again.
In the minute 41, Genoa's Miha Zajc has been booked in Genoa.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lisandro Magallan for Crotone who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 42, Very nearly a goal for Crotone as Simeon Nwankwostrikes the woodwork with a header.
Luca Cigarini of Crotone gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
In the minute 42, Crotone's Lisandro Magallan is back in action after a slight knock.
Paolo Ghiglione for Genoa drives towards goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick Crotone.
In the minute 44, Goran Pandev (Genoa) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
At Luigi Ferraris the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Luigi Ferraris.
Giovanni Stroppa is making the team's first substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Andrea Rispoli replacing Antonio Mazzotta.
Crotone drive upfield and Andrea Rispoli gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Genoa defender.
In the minute 47, Crotone have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Giovanni Ayroldi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Genoa.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
In the minute 51, Mattia Destro is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Genoa's Mattia Destro looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 53, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luca Cigarini (Crotone) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Crotone are coming forward and Junior Messias gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 54, Giovanni Ayroldi awards Genoa a goal kick.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
Miha Zajc (Genoa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 58, Can Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Goal kick for Crotone at Luigi Ferraris.
The away team have replaced Emmanuel Riviere with Augustus Kargbo. This is the third substitution made today by Giovanni Stroppa.
In the minute 59, Eduardo Henrique is replacing Niccolo Zanellato for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Genoa.
Crotone's Junior Messias breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 63, Genoa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 65, Goran Pandev for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in Genoa.
Genoa's Mattia Destro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Crotone defender.
In the minute 68, Play has been interrupted briefly in Genoa to check on Milan Badelj, who is grimacing with pain.
Ivan Radovanovic (Genoa) has replaced the possibly injured Milan Badelj.
Rolando Maran (Genoa) is making a second substitution, with Marko Pjaca replacing Goran Pandev.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
At Luigi Ferraris, Paolo Ghiglione has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 71, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lukas Lerager.
Lukas Lerager has recovered and rejoins the match in Genoa.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Crotone.
Lisandro Magallan (Crotone) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a Crotone throw-in in Genoa's half.
Genoa take a comfortable 4-1 lead thanks to Marko Pjaca.
Paolo Ghiglione instrumental with a fine assist.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Lennart Czyborra is replacing Miha Zajc for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
The home team have replaced Davide Zappacosta with Valon Behrami. This is the fifth substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
In the minute 77, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a throw-in for Crotone, close to Genoa's area.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Genoa.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Genoa.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Crotone at Luigi Ferraris.
Mattia Destro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Genoa.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Genoa.
Genoa's Cristian Zapata attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
In the minute 86, Rolando Maran (Genoa) has taken off Lukas Lerager who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Filippo Melegoni is the replacement.
Tomislav Gomelt is on a sub for Luca Cigarini for Crotone.
Genoa drive forward but Mattia Destro is judged offside.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Giovanni Ayroldi awards the away team a throw-in.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Genoa.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Crotone.
The match has come to a close in Genoa. The final score is 4-1.
Crotone make their fifth substitution with Denis Dragus replacing Simeon Nwankwo.
